00458    inline int AtomStorage::nAtom() const
00459    { return atomSet_.size(); }

00462    { return ghostSet_.size(); }

00473    /*
00474    * On master processor (rank=0), stored value of total number of atoms.
00475    */
00476    inline int AtomStorage::nAtomTotal() const
00477    {
00478       #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00479       if (nAtomTotal_ < 0) UTIL_THROW("Value not set: nAtomTotal < 0");
00480       return nAtomTotal_;
00481       #else
00482       return atomSet_.size();
00483       #endif
00484    }
00485 
00486    // Template method definition
00487 
00488    /*
00489    * Count the number of atoms in this Group and this AtomStorage.
00490    */
00491    template <int N>
00492    int AtomStorage::countGroupAtoms(Group<N>& group) const
00493    {
00494       Atom* ptr;
00495       int nAtom = 0;
00496       for (int i = 0; i < N; ++i) {
00497          ptr = atomPtrs_[group.atomId(i)];
00498          if (ptr) {
00499             if (ptr->isGhost()) {
00500                UTIL_THROW("Found ghost atom");
00501             }
00502             ++nAtom;
00503          }
00504       }
00505       return nAtom;
00506    }
00507 
00508    /*
00509    * Set pointers to atoms in a Group<N> object.
00510    */
00511    template <int N>
00512    int AtomStorage::findGroupAtoms(Group<N>& group) const
00513    {
00514       Atom* ptr;
00515       int nAtom = 0;
00516       for (int i = 0; i < N; ++i) {
00517          ptr = atomPtrs_[group.atomId(i)];
00518          if (ptr) {
00519             group.setAtomPtr(i, ptr);
00520             ++nAtom;
00521          } else {
00522             group.clearAtomPtr(i);
00523          }
00524       }
00525       return nAtom;
00526    }
00527
